title: Residual energy use and energy efficiency improvement of European supermarket facilities during the post-COVID and energy crisis period
content:

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 9

Author(s): Juan Carlos Ríos-Fernández, Juan Manuel González-Caballín, Andrés Meana-Fernández, Antonio José Gutiérrez-Trashorras
